column4: anyone have an nvidia graphics card and use the nvidia settings.  What is "Configured Video Device" in the xorg.conf file?
what are u trying to do
I have two graphics card and either through xorg.conf or through the nvidia-settings change to the second graphics card (in nvidia, it shows up as gpu-1)
only thing i can say is that if i was u i might remove the other one i'm still catching my breath after fighting with display drivers for the past 4 days....
